data.message: Look at all these little bitches who hate eminem now cuz he bashed there favorate president hmmm 🤔 funny when he bashed bush and Clinton you guys had no problem with it but now that it's Trump on how could he ? You guys are so fucking retarted. He's always been doing shit like this. Do you think he gives a fuck what a few butthurt fans think? I gareentee any of you pussies saw him in person you wouldn't say that shit too him you'd be a stan and ask for a autograph and picture 😂
